title: Best of The Program | Guests: Liz Wheeler, Bill O'Reilly, & Justin Haskins | 11/1/21
description:
Liz Wheeler joins to discuss her bombshell story regarding the Navy and vaccine mandates. Justin Haskins, editorial director of the Heartland Institute, joins Glenn to discuss the radical policies promised at the climate summit in Glasgow. Bill O’Reilly joins to clarify a controversial view he holds regarding the vaccine.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
